EmailTemplate.subject: Your Climate Corps Portal Username and Password
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {ContactFirstName},
Thank you for your interest in applying for a fellowship with Climate Corps!
You have been assigned the below Username and Temporary Password for the Climate Corps application portal.
Username: {UserName} Temporary Password: {Password}
To finalize your user account and set up a new password click the following link: https://environmentaldefensefund.my.site.com/EDFCCFellowPortal/s/login/
You may also return to the Climate Corps fellow portal at any time by using the link above.
To be considered for the first round of offers, please submit your application by November 29, 2022 at 11:59 pm PT. All other applications are due on January 10, 2023 at 11:59 pm PT
We look forward to receiving your completed application!
Best, The Climate Corps Team EDFClimateCorps.org
